name: AUXGOD
description:
Tired of everyone hogging the aux cord at your party and only playing the music they think is dope? Squash all that, have a music battle and find out who the AUXGOD is.

In AUXGOD teams go head to head and battle for the best song in response to our playing cards.

- Players are split into three teams
- Each round, one team will act as the judging team and draw a question from the playing cards
- The remaining two teams answer by playing a song from their smartphones.
- The team with the best song is awarded a point by the judges.

It's the perfect party game to get all your guests together while enjoying music.

- Rap and sing to your favorite tracks
- Reminisce about those classic songs you've forgotten about
- Find out who the AUXGOD is in your group of friends

This app features 5 free cards and our official timer.
